website_summaries.verdict: Great Hoover features for a reasonable price.
pros: The 20-foot power cord and lightweight design means freer cleaning around your space
Edge cleaning bristles and extreme recline handle are convenient features that cut down on time cleaning
Users tell us it transitions well between types of flooring

customer_reviews.title: Loses suction!
customer_reviews.text: After about only six weeks of use this vacuum lost a significant amount of suction. We tried to troubleshoot the issue by making sure the airways were cleared and filter clean. The motor also seemed to be making a different sound than usual. Attempting to get Hoover to honor the warranty was a nightmare and we are stuck with a broken vacuum. Thanks for nothing Hoover! We will never buy another Hoover product ever again! $80 down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won't last more than a couple months before smoking
customer_reviews.text: This is a no-no for anyone wanting something to last more than a couple weeks. Bought the first on and it lasted about 1 year (we have a 500 sq/ft all vinyl floor home), second one lasted about 3 months and Amazon processed a return. We bought a third one thinking the second was a fluke but no...this one failed after 2 months. The motor is apparently defective and begins smoking and making bad sounds. The design is good. We like the lightweight and easy handling/cleaning but the quality is abysmal to say the least. Do not buy this product. Your wasting your money.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Schumann

customer_reviews.title: lightweight and good suction
customer_reviews.text: Dislike that this is the 2nd one I have ordered and they are both defected. Handle can not attach to unit as unit hole was drilled too large for the special screw. Replacement , same thing. I am probably going to keep it and wrap tape around the handle to secure it as I like the vacuum. I am disappointed Hoover would not send another screw out or offer any help. It does pick up animal hair very well.
customer_reviews.author: Cat R.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but powerful
customer_reviews.text: The review is VERY delayed...bought item back in September, but had to write today. Initially bought this little vacuum for quick cleanups of kitty litter and to reach under the bed to tackle mounds of cat hair(Persian shares our home). But the real test came this morning with cleaning up around two of our 3 Christmas trees. This little guy attacks pine needles!!! I love this vacuum!!! It is a powerhouse. And super lightweight so I can haul it from room to room with ease. Not a huge production to vacuum a small area like getting out my Windtunnel. Did I mention easy to clean/empty too? One of my best purchases of the year!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: This is a an excellent lightweight, effective vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews, but this is my second one of the day. I’ve had this vacuum since 2014. It is excellent. I’m older, and didn’t want a heavy vacuum to haul up and down stairs. I have both hardwood floors and area rugs, so I needed something that would be effective for both. I also have shedding dogs, so I have to vacuum pretty constantly. This little vac takes care of dog hair and everything else on both surfaces. I’ve never had a problem with it that didn’t involve user error (getting too much dog hair stuffed up in it!) I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Powell

customer_reviews.title: We get what we pay for, don't we? ...
customer_reviews.text: We get what we pay for, don't we? This cleaner does the job, but it is so light that it wobbles, and the cord stows unwieldily. Hence the job of hoovering the floor is also something of a job to un-do the wrap of the cord, then something of a job to steady the machine on during the pushing about, and another something of a job to re-wrap the cord at the end. Some days I think it would be easier but definitely not tidy simply to leave the cord on the floor so that it is ready to go next time.
customer_reviews.author: alsoanonyma

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: From the beginning I had to run the brushes or the fur would pile up on the brush. I only have wood floors. It left some dirt. I had to damp mop my floors to get the loose dirt. I vacuum every other day to keep up with the fur! After 5 months the brushes brushes would work intermittently. I called Hoover and they wanted me to take it to the repair center that is in a bad area of town a half hour away. Amazon refunded my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David L Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Returned so not sure how it works.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this and did not realize that it was a discounted returned product. It was very dirty, obviously used more than once or twice. Don't mind my own dirt but really did not want to pay for someone else's. Returned product with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Mackie2u2

customer_reviews.title: Very effective on hard floors -- terrific value
customer_reviews.text: Every once in a while, a product surprises me in a good way. This is one of them. This little vacuum cleaner works brilliantly on hard floors. We have three dogs and a lot of dirt. This picks up the dirt, the sand, the hair, the mess without complaint. I have not used it on rugs. On hardwood or linoleum, it's great. Easy to maneuver. Lightweight. VERY easy to empty and clean. The cord is long enough so I can vacuum my kitchen, hall and living room without moving the plug. I've paid a lot more and gotten much less. This is a very good value and a highly effective vacuum for hard floors.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn ArmstrongTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: This Vacuum is Defective
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum doesn't work. It stopped working after one use. I purchased this vacuum a couple of year's ago, so as to use it as a device for in-between-major cleanups. I used it once, after which I washed out the cup and put it away. I tried to use it a second time, and the motor sounded good, but the machine wasn't picking up. I recently I tried using it, and I experience the same thing, i.e., it sounds like it's working, but it's not picking up. Guess I'll have to throw it away. I can't recommend this product. Put your resources toward a Dyson or toward a Shark. This model is defective.
customer_reviews.author: N. J. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: it's good. Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This stick vacuum arrived today - 2-5 days ahead of expected delivery date!! - and I tested it out. I'm hard on vacuum cleaners - I expect a lot from them. So, for what this is, it's good. Easy to put together, very easy to maneuver, simple to maintain and has pretty good suction, but not too much, so I can vacuum small area rugs without the vacuum trying to inhale them. As far as durability, I'll have to report back on that when I've had it a while. But I've been able to count on Hoovers in the past, so chances are it will last long enough to be worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: hawk-of-the-field

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a Dream (While It Worked)
customer_reviews.text: I loved this vacuum for nearly six months, using it for an 800 sq ft apartment with long curly hair and 2 cats. It never really worked on hard floors, but I needed it for the carpet and it did just fine! But then it stopped picking things up. Suction still worked, but there was nothing in the dust cup. Tried a few fixes, but couldn't get it to work again. Not sure how long I expected it to last, but it was longer than 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Catie

customer_reviews.title: Ok vacuum but could be improved
customer_reviews.text: I have to say it does have good suction BUT it does not have a swivel head as described, the HANDLE swivels not the head. It also does not have the "extreme recline" as described. It is so frustrating as it could be easily fixed. Why doesn't Hoover do it??? Also when you remove the dust cup and put it back in place the clasp that hold this entire piece in is so fragile it barely grabs the plastic decanter. I feel it is just a matter of time before it will break.
customer_reviews.author: Lacy, North Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Light weight workhorse
customer_reviews.text: This vaccuum is my friend. I have a place in my heart for it. It is hard working: picks up crumbs and scraps and most things small enough to be sucked up. It is lightweight: my three year old helped me put it together, can take it out of the closet for me, and even uses it to sweep from time to time (looves chores). It is sturdy and tough: I have banged it into the wall, dropped it more than once, run it over things I shouldn’t have, and used it nearly every day for a year now. Works great. Hoover...Nobody does it like you—-thanks!
customer_reviews.author: J. H.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I had some particular needs in buying this. I am in my late seventies, with back problems, and a major requirement was that it be light and easy to handle. Another was that it be good for picking up cat hair. It meets both those requirements, and was also very easy to assemble and start using. Also easy to empty the container with no spillage when finished. The cord is very long. I'm pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte M

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased July 16th, it is now Sept. 29 so this one almost made it 60 days!! Weak not sucking up dust actually send it out! I thought buying the one with a cord would help, since the cordless one went down also, but Nope it didn't!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Good Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Good for cleaning up after three small children. I use it several times a day, and it does the job. I have to empty it often, at least every other day. It works well on my carpet rug but does better on the hard laminate floors. I haven’t had any problems and find it very easy to use and empty/clean. I gave four stars rather than five just because I would like a little more power to the suction. It is a good vacuum that I don’t regret buying. My mom has one too that she loves for quick messes in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Judith T.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one in one year. My wife uses it to vacuum our hardwood floors every day. The motor on the first one burnt out in 8 months so we bought another one. This one has only lasted two months. The motor smells like it is on fire! Hoover is certainly not what is used to be. Stay away from this product!
customer_reviews.author: Tom D

customer_reviews.title: Broke down after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: There was a burn smell and it lost the suction. It just happened after the Amazon return window time. 20 years ago, I bought a Hoover vacuum and it is still working. Appliances should not break down after less than a total of 2 hours of use.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper123

customer_reviews.title: Best small vacuum on the market
customer_reviews.text: I owned one of these for 4 1/2 years and used it nearly daily. Something in it finally stopped working (brush wouldn't roll, no suction, but it was making noise, so maybe motor burnt out?), and I immediately bought this replacement. The new updates to it make it even better than my prior one. Picks up everything in its path. Would probably be fine as an overall vacuum for homes without carpet - it does pick up quite a lot of dirt, pet hair, etc., but I don't think it does a super deep clean of carpet. It does pick up anything else though - cereal, pet food, cat litter, you name it. Great little vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Brian P

customer_reviews.title: Would be great if it lasted
customer_reviews.text: It would be exactly what I needed for my house if it lasted past the 6 month warranty window. I only used it lightly about 1-2 times a week so its not like it was being over-taxed. One day when I turned it on the motor started making a foul smoking/melting plastic smell and I have about 3 days before my warranty ends so now I have to rush it to a service center half an hour away if I want it to be fixed. I went through customer service and did all the troubleshooting, there are no clogs anywhere, this is definitely a motor defect. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Best stick vacuum ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one I've bought over the years. I have two cats and lots of cat hair!! This little vacuum is so light weight it's easy to use. I use it every day (sometimes twice or three times a day)! There is loose kitty litter that gets walked into the rest of the house from where the litter box is. It is so quick to get this out of the closet and it's just a quick clean up. Couldn't live without it! Seriously.
customer_reviews.author: HannaH

customer_reviews.title: Great little Vac!
customer_reviews.text: Aside from the dust canister being a little small, I have no complaints. It is small and strong. I use it at work and keep it in a closet. It takes up a small space, and does a good job. We have the cordless one at home. Both work great!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Akioka

customer_reviews.title: Wont scratch floors
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I run a home daycare with 6 small children plus we have 2 dogs that shed. I vaccum everyday. We also have decomposed granite in our backyard that the kids bring in on their shoes. As long as I use the bare floor setting the DG does not scratch the floors or get stuck in the wheels. I highly recommend this for everyday use. I do still have to use my kirby once a week to get into the nooks and crannies.
customer_reviews.author: Crows Finds

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Machine !!
customer_reviews.text: This little machine is EXACTLY what I was looking for!!!! I have a whole house vacuum cleaner with a 30 foot hose. What a pain in the neck to pull it out for a quick vacuum after the grandbabies have been here. This little workhorse is light, powerful, and makes my life a whole lot easier. We now pull out the heavy duty monster for the deep once a week cleaning on the weekends and use the little guy for the quick clean-ups. I opted for a corded machine rather than a cordless because I didn't want to worry about mounting and charging issues. The cord doesn't bother me at all. I highly recommend this machine for your quick clean-ups!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money-crap vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum lasted for only 7 months. I bought this vacuum because of many good reviews and needed a lightweight one. This is so cheaply made it looks like a toy vacuum. At the beginning it used to pick up light dust or papers or visible dirt but after using for several times it stopped picking things up from the floor and the carpet. It was cleaned properly after use but it seems the suction doesn't work. When I started vacuuming it made a sound/noise that it was going to die soon and eventually stopped working. So, don't waste your money for this product.
customer_reviews.author: shopperus

customer_reviews.title: Really good cordless vacuum. One small issue...
customer_reviews.text: Really good cordless vacuum. One small issue...This is a fantastic cordless vacuum. We have a lot of wooden floors in our home and we can do them all a couple of times before needing to re-charge it. It has extremely strong suction and is able to pick up small items on the hard floors that other vacuums have left behind. My only caveat is that the battery has to be removed and charged externally every time it gets low. This is not a problem if you owned two batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Mikebib

customer_reviews.title: Good little vacuum. No major problems.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little vacuum! Works great for pet fur and small messes. Only downside is that it doesn’t do amazing with picking up very long hair. I live in an apartment with 2 other girls with long hair so I have to clean out the brush in the bottom of the vacuum occasionally. Very lightweight and great quality/suction. I’ve had this vacuum for almost 3 years now and it still works great. I bought it for $50 new (I think the price has now gone up though).
customer_reviews.author: Maranda Fulco

customer_reviews.title: This is a great vacuum. Its lightweight & easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a great vacuum. Its lightweight & easy to use. I keep it charge so I can just go over hardwood floors or carpet a easily.. Better then having to use a broom. I make sure I empty it after a few uses but that is so easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Spishock

customer_reviews.title: TRULY REMARKABLE STICK VACUUM
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing little vacuum. Excellent suction. Excellent on pet hair and cat litter. Excellent transition from rug to floor. Excellent on stairs. Lightweight and excellent maneuverability. Excellent edging. Suction like a full size vacuum but quieter than most stick vacuums. Good size vacuum head and long extension cord make getting the job done easy. Honestly, I hate to vacuum but since I got this Hoover, it's almost become fun! If you're looking for a good stick vacuum, I don't see how you can go wrong with this. Full disclosure, I've only had it a week so I can't comment on it's durability. It seems well made and I anticipate I'll be using it for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: deborah arthur

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a year, no refund from manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: Worked ok (for the price) for about a year. Then the suction stopped working on hard surfaces, despite maintaining the vacuum as specified. The motor would keep overheating after only a few minutes of use, causing the vacuum to stop working. I'd have to wait for an hour for the motor to cool down so I could use the vacuum again. Finally, the brushes just stopped spinning and the vacuum is now worthless. I contacted the manufacturer (since Amazon won't allow you to return it), and they said they only issue refunds/exchanges if you purchased directly from them.
customer_reviews.author: Annon.

customer_reviews.title: if you want to get the job done quick then don't buy this one
customer_reviews.text: its almost a year now, I like the vacuum until now, it gets over heated and vacuum only vacuums only for 15 minutes before it gets over heated, I have to stop wait for a few hours and try to see if it works it does, it is only good for 15 minutes of vacuuming, you have to let it cool down, not good for customer satisfaction do you agree
customer_reviews.author: juanita w wicks-wilson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VACUUM and GREAT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: I had really researched vacuums for some time and was toying with getting a small handheld vacuum which I have had previously. After reading the reviews and researching, I decided on the Hoover Linx since this is primarily for my upstairs and smaller jobs. My other vacuum is large, heavy and does a fantastic job, but I was tired of carrying it up and down stairs. The Hoover Linx is absolutely perfect, very light weight, but it is amazing at getting the work done. It even leaves lines on the carpet so the carpet looks vacuumed. I could not be more pleased and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: It works great I just always run it on carpet
customer_reviews.text: For dog hair need to have on carpet setting even on our wood floors. It works great I just always run it on carpet. Super lightweight, I was able to use my whole pregnant and post c section no issues. For being small it's amazing how much it can pick up. My mom has one too and is able to use the hard floor setting so unsure if it's user error or just too much dog hair having two heavy shedding dogs. But none of the less it works great getting all their hair. I'll even use in the stairs as light enough and small enough.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay J

customer_reviews.title: Cat hair plugs suction tube
customer_reviews.text: My wife complained that our model SH20030 Hoover vac wasn't picking up anything even though the cyclone cylinder was empty. Upon close examination I discover that the duct from the power head to the cyclone cylinder entrance was packed with cat hair ( see attached photo). It was a major job to clean this duct passage because of the curves and angles built into it. Finally, using a wire hook and my air compressor, I was able to remove all of the hair. This vac is, obviously, not engineered to handle animal hair. This probably explains why I see so many being picked up by our neighborhood trash hauler.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this vacuum for close to 4 years, and I still love it! No bags to worry about. It picks up great on hardwoods and area rugs. Cord is long. Fearful of the saying that “all good things come to an end,” I purchased an extra to keep on hand, just in case I can’t get another one. I have bought 3 additional ones for gifts. This is not good if you have lots of hair from animals. I empty mine each time I use it. It takes about one minute.
customer_reviews.author: Grandmother Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. It is light weight and quiet. Suction is OK - I do not like the trend in vacuums to use giant 12-amp motors that pull the rugs right off the floor. This one only draws 2 amps. The dust bin is small but that is OK because it is very easy to remove and empty. The power switch selects whether the floor beater-brush is on or not depending on carpet vs. hardwood or tile. The head swivels left/right to help with maneuvering. It has no "tools" or hose but that is OK with me - I can use my old vac or shop vac as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Larry W

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: I grew up with Hoovers, as of late they have been disappointing. The on button had a hard time getting to the carpet position. Vacuum seemed real flimsy. Going back to Dirt Devil, sorry Hoover.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Fredian

customer_reviews.title: okay but it has some problems
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is good for light cleaning. It has trouble picking up cereal or dry pet food. Clean up is also an issue. One day, I noticed my vacuum not working properly. I didn't see the spinning in the canister. So I took my vacuum apart and found that dirt got accumulated inside the body. There was a blockage somewhere so I had to clean it all out. It was a pain to put back. This vacuum is good for carpet but not on wooden floors. I had to redo my floors with another vacuum and some sweeping to get all the dirt out.
customer_reviews.author: N.C.A.

customer_reviews.title: Great for quick pick up and dog hair on rugs
customer_reviews.text: I have used this vacuum for several months now. It is so easy to pull out of the closet and use, that I go to it before my big vac. I wanted one with a power roller to pick up dog hair from the rugs and it does the job. I always marvel how much hair gets caught in the dust cup - and it's easy to dump into the trash. The foam filter is also easy to remove and rinse out with clear water, let dry and put back. Vacuuming is fun.
customer_reviews.author: Diane D

customer_reviews.title: I loved this little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I loved this little vacuum..It was light weight,compact, worked beautifully. I used it 3 times a week(~15mins) for not even a year and the fuse blew which is an irreplaceable part. So I can not use it and there is no web page in which to order spare parts and there is no way for me to get in touch with the company to report a problem or a defect with the vacuum through amazon. You only have a month in which to return or replace the item and that is not enough time. Companies should honor their products. I expected more from Hoover and am disappointed in their disposable mindset.
customer_reviews.author: A Reader

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: This little wonder does just what I wanted it to do. I have tile floors and two rugs and buzz thru the house on one charge daily. It picks it all up great. I love not being tied to a cord and it is so light weight. We use the heavy vacuum one a week on the rugs for a deeper clean
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: I like that this is a very lightweight vacuum - I ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is a very lightweight vacuum - I have mostly wood floors that I use it on. I have one just like it that is cordless - battery is dying, so buying this was not much more than a new battery - unfortunately, I missed that part about this being "corded" - was hoping I was getting a deal on a cordless - I love my cordless. Only complaint is that it was missing the one and only screw that you need for assembling, but upon calling Hoover it was sent to me in less than 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Nilsen

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job! but like another reviewer said the button to press to release the vacuum from upright is difficult to press... you have to bend down & press with your finger.. not able to press with a foot. I use it on hardwood & ceramic floors & on the carpet setting for throw rugs. It is still new, so don't know how long it will last, but so far I am impressed by it. I use it between full out floor cleanings to help the floor stay clean longer. all hard floors are hard to sweep and mop all the time. The cord is a bit short. It could be longer. Still I would recommend this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Massaging Yoga RN

customer_reviews.title: Dependable Soldier in the Fight for Clean
customer_reviews.text: I live in a relatively small condo and have been using this compact, light weight, versatile vacuum cleaner since November, 2014. Six years later, it is still going strong and still our go-to cleaning machine. Just make sure you regularly replace the air filter to maintain the strong suction.
customer_reviews.author: WoodsSuper

customer_reviews.title: The worst electric broom I have bought in 40 years. It doesn’t even deserve one star!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in July and used it about six times or less. I have had the worst time with this so called Hoover Linz Vacuum. In the past I have bought other brands such as Shark, Electrolux, Bissell that lasted years and were Less Expensive. I took it apart to is if there was something blocking the suction. The brushes work but No Suction. I would of thought it would work for a longer time. I feel I should be able to return and hopefully receive another one. For that kind of money and to feel that Hoover would want to back this up for their reputation.
customer_reviews.author: Debra D. Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Nice vacuum if you plan on (NOT) using it !
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this vacuum for those quick pick up jobs around the house as I'm a bit of a neat freak. Unfortunately, this item lacks any semblance of quality, and is supersonic noisy. All things considered, as long as it did those little jobs around the house (WHICH IT SEEMED TO BE DOING) I was willing to overlook what I had previously mentioned. Well, using the vacuum on or about the 3rd or 4th time I noticed an electrical burning smell which was coming from the exhaust air of the vacuum.=================DEAL BREAKER=============RETURNED VACUUM=========
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic lightweight vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I use this to vacuum some rooms, a hallway/landing, the stairs, and a carpet runner. The vacuum can handle all of those areas without needing to empty the canister, and the cord is long enough that I don't need to move the plug to a different outlet. It also works well cleaning up gym chalk from both foam puzzle mats and horse stall mats.
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: RUBBER CORD COVER BROKE AND EXPOSED WIRES
customer_reviews.text: I loved this vacuum. Bought it 2 yrs. ago. Recently the cord pulled away from the plastic wand exposing shredded wires. Although it's beyond the return period, I'm trying to get Amazon to refund my money since this is a safety concern. We'll see what happens.
customer_reviews.author: Remember Cecil the Lion

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a surprisingly effective little stick vacuum. It does well on the laminate and also on the throw rugs and on the carpet. We have a cat that produces copious amounts of hair, and we have to clean out the receptacle every single time we use it, sometimes twice, so you know it's effective at picking up the hair. We like the mobility and that it is lightweight, so much nicer than dragging out the heavy vacuum to do a quick clean.
customer_reviews.author: MG62

customer_reviews.title: The Best Little Vacuum around
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure what year I bought my first Hoover Stick Vacuum but probably close to 20 years ago. I finally wore it out and replaced it about 7 years ago. That one still works great but now we have a vacation home and I wanted one for it. I love this one just as much as the others and is easier to clean as it is bagless. Even my husband goes for the little vac over our big Hoover and thinks it does a great job. It is light weight and the brush can be switched off for hard surfaces. A must have for e ery home!
customer_reviews.author: Mary G

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing at sucking up kitty litter
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about two weeks and used it three times. Setup took about 10 seconds. It's amazing at sucking up kitty litter, hair, dirt, and even ants. It's much better on hardwood than on carpet or rugs, but I still wish it came with a hose/attachments to use for the cat trees. As other reviews have stated, the dirt canister is a little small, but it's simple and quick to detach, toss the dirt in the garbage, and reattach.
customer_reviews.author: What's that smell?

customer_reviews.title: Light and powerful
customer_reviews.text: A dream to use. I found this on Amazon when my mom, who is in her 90’s, wanted something light and bagless. It really has power too! Everyone who used it bought one and I now own three myself. They don’t take up much space so are easy to store. My son even vacuums his room with the one I keep in his closet. I love that they are bagless and the filter is washable. I bought extra filters and a belt on Amazon so I am ready if they need replacement at some point.
customer_reviews.author: MRF1962

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Our home has mostly hard flooring with ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Our home has mostly hard flooring with one 8 X 10 rug and several mats inside exterior doorways and on either side of beds. This lightweight stick vacuum is great on the floors. sucks up edges and corners, and is great for light surface vacuuming of the rug and the mats. We have two dogs and three cats and I was looking for a lightweight vac that could handle daily pet hair pickup. the Hoover Corded Cyclonic Stick Vacuum does all of this with ease and transitions from hard floor to rug and mat easily. Emptying the basket is a breeze. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Great little vacuum!!
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. I have dark hardwood floors and a white cat. So every other day I vacuum. This has enough suction to pick up dirt, cat hair chip crumbs, etc. Small stuff. It works great on carpets too. Its so light that I do my stairs with it too. I did 4 stars because it would be such an amazing purchase if it had a little more suction to pick up popcorn.
customer_reviews.author: bleonard24

customer_reviews.title: Great at first...
customer_reviews.text: I loved this vaccum at first! It picked up everything, was easy to empty,great with hair! And it's so light. Would be perfect for people with back problems and the elderly. However I've had it a year now recently it's decided to not fully suck everything up so when your done and you turn it off all of the dirt falls back out! It's SO annoying!! I have to get my broom out to sweep up the pile left...so it's kinda pointless! (I have majority hardwood and some carpet)
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Good Vacuum, Small Collection Container
customer_reviews.text: I live in a house with six other people. Half of whom are petite women. We switch up who does the floors each week, so we needed a vacuum that everyone in the house could use. Everyone really likes this vacuum and it picks up well. The only problem is that the collection container is pretty small. Our house is 1600 sq. ft, and we have to empty after each vacuum. Really, we should empty twice because the dirt is already climbing up out of the collection container into the vacuum area just above. If you live with fewer people or in a smaller place, you'll probably be fine. I still am glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: i like this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: i like this vacuum. i bought the cordless version prior and HATED the rechargable battery. it doesnt hold a charge for longer than 10 minutes, so i bought this one because i still liked the style and handling of the vacuum itself. i like that it's super lightweight, easily manuverable. i have all hardwood and tile, no carpet, and it cleans up nicely. i have a 2000 square foot home, vacuum 2/3 times a week to keep up with the dirt and this vacuum is just right for me.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle JohnstonTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing. Little pivot range and poorer suction than my Hoover Flair had.
customer_reviews.text: I had the Hoover Flair (floor to carpet) and loved it's agility. Unfortunately it fell and the head casing broke (motor still works!). I bought this as a replacement based on the reviews. There is far less pivot range - almost none, and the roller brush hangs on to the cat hair so that the bin may be empty, but the hair is completely blocking anything from being sucked in. Too late to return it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Parker

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: I like it because its small easy to carrier and but for any reason stop working the bad thing that I already destroyed the box and I cannot return it my advice don't buy it unless that you have a hardwood floor might be great for you I use it and didn't work I use it in my small carpet it didn't work so not for me it didn't work
customer_reviews.author: YeyeCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Buy This!
customer_reviews.text: This little Vac is AWESOME! All the replacement belts, brush bar, baffle, & extra reusable filters are available - most stick vacs don't offer replacements, as I found out the hard way! IT HAS MORE POWER than anyone would expect, too! The only change I would make would be to have an interchangeable head for an edge/crevice tool! Maybe the next model...?
customer_reviews.author: Debs

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price and size
customer_reviews.text: This is really a great little vacuum! Surprisingly powerful and easy to maneuver. The only thing that is keeping it from 5 stars is the placement of the on/off switch. It's a little awkward that's it not up at the top of the handle, but other than that it's great!
customer_reviews.author: ksimrell

customer_reviews.title: 5 years later, still a workhorse
customer_reviews.text: This is perhaps one of the best products I have ever purchased on Amazon, I always tell myself to take the time to write a review after marveling at the fact this little beast is still doing its thing but am just getting around to it. It's incredibly well made and sturdy. Great on hardwoods of all types (finished, unfinished, old restored wood floors) and carpets. Crazy simple to empty and clean. I believe most of the negative reviews you'll read about it are due to misuse.
customer_reviews.author: dgbreme

customer_reviews.title: was looking for good vacuum cleaner for my two bedrom apartment
customer_reviews.text: I dont understand in vacuum cleaners brands,was looking for good vacuum cleaner for my two bedrom apartment,i have 2 carpets and a CAT,so his hair is everywhere,. Today my Hoover vacuum was delivered and i tried it asap, and i must say this vacuum did AMAZING job!!!! My carpets and floors are very clean now. Vacuum picked all cat hair,my (long) hair, dust!!!! Not heavy ,very easy to use!!! And very good suction !!! Im happy with my purchase! 2 years update: Vacuum is broken burned by itself 🤷‍♀️so sad.
customer_reviews.author: Ekaterina Nemtseva

customer_reviews.title: convenient and does the job
customer_reviews.text: I already have the battery operated Hoover and still use it. This has an electric cord which is long enough to do a good size area. I keep the battery one at one end of the house and this one at the other end which gets the most traffic. It's perfect for every day use and quick non fuss cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Joan C

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I use to. Have this with the battery But this one works about the same
customer_reviews.author: Linda n.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I am a senior citizen so light weight is essential. I bought this in 2015 and I've never had a problem. It works well for a small vacuum.. It cleans dog hair to tiny pieces of lint . I think the key is to clean it often and it will do a good job for you..
customer_reviews.author: minijudy

customer_reviews.title: This is not suitable for even moderate use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this vacuum as a light backup for my Dyson. This is already outside by the trash. Maybe I got a defective one. It had a very flimsy feel to it. After a month it wouldn't even pick up crumbs from the hardwood kitchen floor. Very poor suction. I have never been more disappointed in a vacuum. I would've given no stars if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Latoya Grier

customer_reviews.title: Sucks up pet fur well!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had the battery powered ones before so this is nice, although the cord is a bit short. This is the only cordless stick vac I have found that sucks up pet fur off of my rugs, carpeted stairs and tile floors. We have 3 cats and one Herman Shepherd so I’m constantly cleaning. I wish they had made the canister a bit bigger because it fills up fast!! Really sucks up the fur and debris fast. I use it in between using the bigger Hoover pet vacuum for my larger carpeted areas.
customer_reviews.author: mindy l.

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight and easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: Good vacuum for light house cleaning. Light weight and easy handling. Suction is average so if you have deep or extremely dirty carpet, a heavier vacuum might work better. Great for what we have though. Makes cleaning the stairs a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: Worst product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst product for cleaning hair, the suction reduces drastically. We talked to the customer Service but they were also not very helpful, they just gave us tips which is common sense and also they can’t take the product back or replace it, so this product was really a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Piyush

customer_reviews.title: The little Gray Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I had a cordless one and loved it. I didn't read the directions very well and got one with a cord which it is not long enough I have to plug it into 4 different Outlets. It's very good for picking up hair. I just love my cordless and this one makes really loud noise. Because it's refurbed.
customer_reviews.author: Judy k

customer_reviews.title: Best little vac, Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: After much research on corded and cordless stick vacs, settled on this one though it was not listed as the most popular seller. Best purchase! Love this little vacuum!! Easy to assemble from the box and not flimsy or fragile. Lite and easy to pull out of the closet and use. Has good suction for all the little things hanging out on my floor that need to go bye-bye. Was surprised at how well it suctioned the carpet too. It does not replace my reg vacuum cleaner but def replaces my broom! Use it all the time. Yes, the cord is short but just attached a longer extension cord to it and solved that problem. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Linda C. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: started burning about 2 years after purchase, terrible with hair,
customer_reviews.text: the vacuum worked pretty well for the first few months but after about 1 year of moderate use (probably 2 times a month in a 1 bedroom apartment occupied by 1 person) many issues started popping up, it stopped sucking as much, the brush on the roll would require constant cleanup and now something started burning inside (it smells and it got very hot). I wish I could just return it. Don't buy it unless you need a device for <12 months.
customer_reviews.author: Karolina Chachulska

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had put the money towards a better vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a lighter vacuum because of how often I have to clean up after my two cats. I have hardwood floors with rugs on them and this thing really struggles to get the hair up off of the rugs. On the hardwood I have to go really slowly over the cat litter several times to get it to pick up. Wishing I had put the money towards a better vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Love this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for hardwood, tile and laminate. I bought it because I hate stooping over when I sweep and I have a lot of hardwood surface so this saves a lot aches and pains plus time. The only thing wrong is I wish I was able to afford the cordless one because it’s even easier to use and very convenient but I wasn’t. I still highly recommend this product Happy Cleaning !
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Baty

customer_reviews.title: Impeller broke apart no suction
customer_reviews.text: Well this finally died. It had been having issues with suction. It finally lost suction and sounded like it was grinding. I took it apart and sure enough there were shards all over the inside of the housing. It got used weekly on about 750sq feet. 1/3 floor 2/3 carpet. My guess is the bearings were shot after 3.5 years and it just ground itself into oblivion. Last hoover I'll own these should not be breaking for 5-10 years at least. My old hoover is still going strong (but it's heavy) after ~20 years.
customer_reviews.author: John Rouillard

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product! I bought this product in the middle December and it already stopped working right. I live in a one bedroom apartment and only have carpet in the bedroom and an area rug in the living room. I vaccum only a couple times a month and by February it would not suck up anything. I was very disappointed. It is a great size for an apartment but unfortunately did not live up to my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Thorpe

customer_reviews.title: Hoover does everything I ask of it
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum does everything I ask of it. Great for hard floors and surprising good on carpet. But don't expect it to replace your carpet sweeper for deep-down cleaning. (That's more of a gut reaction from looking at the debris collected by the sweeper, not some comparative analysis.) I like the ease of using the vacuum, its maneuverability and the convenience of the cord high on the stick to reach easily. Length of cord is also very convenient. Definitely recommend this for hard floors, rugs and as a backup to your carpet sweeper.
customer_reviews.author: N. E. Webner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for apartment
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I need! I'm in an apartment with both smooth floors and carpet. Strong suction for a stick vacuum, not too loud. I like that you can use it with or without the beater brush. Cord link is sufficient, only need to move the plug once to vacuum my entire apartment. Just wish it had attachments.
customer_reviews.author: DMG22

customer_reviews.title: This stick vac is terrible and barely has suction it doesn't fit under kitchen ...
customer_reviews.text: This stick vac is terrible and barely has suction it doesn't fit under kitchen cabinets and you have to go over and over and over for it to pick up. I would expect a mush higher quality for what I paid. never will buy a hoover again. I bought a $30 Eureka once that would run circles around this mess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little bare floor vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This little vacuum is just perfect for vacuuming our new vinyl floors. I love that I can easily go from the bare floors to my area rugs. It does not do great on regular high pile carpet, but perfect for low pile rugs. The vacuum is lightweight and small which helps it do a pretty good job getting close to walls and in corners. Love that it has a filter that can be cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: lilymom1113

customer_reviews.title: I have a bad back and small & light is precisely what I ...
customer_reviews.text: My first reaction was that it was all plastic and very small. Then I remembered why I needed it. I have a bad back and small & light is precisely what I wanted! It's seems to be very effective. I really like the way it cleans on the sides. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie  unt

customer_reviews.title: Great for elderly
customer_reviews.text: Wow, it's great. Everything i wanted in a vacuum cleaner. I'm 83 and pushing my other vacuum weighing 20 lbs, was impossible. I would literally collapse in a chair after pushing to clean a small area rug with the other one. Easy as 1,2,3 to put together. I could not believe the dust it collected as we have no animals or children. Actually, now i want to do it every day, just cause i can.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: GREATEST STICK VACUUM!
customer_reviews.text: The suction is great and it picks up stuff right at the baseboards where others don't. Really for harwood floors, tile, lenolium, and quick once-overs on low-pile carpets. This is my seond one and I bought two of my sisters each one!
customer_reviews.author: Rache^l Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great Lightweight Stick Vacuum with lots of suction power.
customer_reviews.text: For a lightweight stick vacuum this Hoover does a really good job. I use it in the 5th wheel we live in. A central vac system came with the 5th wheel but the hose broke and it was cheeaper to buy this vacuum than replace the hose plus this one does a better job of getting up the dirt.
customer_reviews.author: BetsyH

customer_reviews.title: Second Sweeper
customer_reviews.text: This is a great second sweeper. It is so light, I can pick up and carry upstairs without any problem. Maneuverability is awesome, being able to get in corners or under tables and chairs without having to move them every time. Easy to clean and store. While it tells you it is not as efficient on thicker carpet and it probably isn't it does a nice job picking up any lint or crumbs with ease. It also has a setting for running on bare floors - nice for kitchens. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Happy traveler

customer_reviews.title: But for a stick vacuum this to me is the best one I have owned and I have had many ...
customer_reviews.text: I have shoulder problems so only use stick vacuums. The one I had just didn't have much suction. I saw the reviews for the Hoover Cyclonic on Amazon and on other sites that rated stick vacuums. This one was number one. I had just vacuumed my floors and rugs the day before this one arrived. I decided to go over my rugs since that's the big test. I was shocked at how much more it got up. For those who have reviewed this and compare it to an upright you shouldn't. But for a stick vacuum this to me is the best one I have owned and I have had many over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Happy Cat Owner
customer_reviews.text: This little vacuum is GREAT. I have a cat so I vacuum "EVERY" day!!!!!! Dragging out a full sized vacuum is daunting so I though I would give this one a try. This Hoover Stick Vacuum work great and boy does it have wonderful suction power to lift all my cat hair. I love the see thru dust canister that way I can see exactly what I'm picking up. I am very satisfied with my purchase!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracker13

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is light weight and easy to maneuver. It has two functions, bare floor and carpet. The bare floor feature doesn't employ the beater bar which when you have wall to wall hardwood floor or tile, makes it sound quieter which is a bonus if you have skittish pets. Excellent suction, picked up dirt and pet hair with no issue (4 cats and 1 dog), it even got a wayward popcorn seed. Highly recommended for those of us without carpet and sweeping with a broom is a long process.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Sunderlin

customer_reviews.title: Hoover Corded Cyonic Stick Vacuum SH20030
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Stick Vacuum. Works very well and is light weight to use. Has a two function switch to vacuum with beater bar running or beater bar shut off. Great suction power to pick up dirt and debris on hard wood floors and is quiet running. The greatest feature of this stick vacuum is the wheels on it as they are super soft and do not scratch hard wood floors. Highly recommend the Hoover!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my Flair stick vacuum which I broke. (It worked perfectly but got broken due to my clumsiness.) The Cyclonic does a nice job on both my carpets and on my bare floors.. I use it a lot because I have a parakeet that tosses seed husks all over the place and molts, too. I haven't found a way to hang this vac on the hook where I used to hang my Flair but it will stand by itself in the same broom closet. I wish the bare floor/carpet indicator could have been placed a little higher on the machine. I do like the ease of emptying out the dirt.
customer_reviews.author: baksort

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: I liked this so much I bought one for my upstairs and one for downstairs. I also plan to order another to use at my beach house. For such a small vacuum, it picks up great. So lightweight. I really hope it lasts!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennabug

customer_reviews.title: Great little vacuum that picks up cat hair!
customer_reviews.text: As a pet parent of two cats, cat hair is a constant issue. This little vacuum gets the job done! It picks up a lot of cat hair that my previous vacuum wasn't able to, along with dirt that was deposited there for years. I didn't realize how dirty my apartment was until I run this guy through my carpet. The downside is that the foam filter inside gets dirty really quickly- you have to wash it out often and air-dry before your next round of vacuuming. Buying extra sets of foam filter is recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Lee

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Quality Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this vacuum. It works exactly as advertised and does an excellent job on hardwoods, linoleums and area rugs as well. It is very well made, user friendly and nice and easy to clean out and wash the container after use. No bags to buy. I would highly recommend this vacuum. The price is very fair and reasonable for a product that works well and is very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Betty L.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE< LOVE< LOVE this vac
customer_reviews.text: LOVE< LOVE< LOVE this vac. I had purchased 2 for my grown kids when they bought their houses and when I used it at their house, I just had to get one for myself. It picks up amazing amounts of debris and animal hair off of carpets as well as flooring. It is lightweight and easy to use with amazing suction for a vac this size. It has a cord, which I prefer, as I think the power will be there for a long while. My kids have been using their's on a daily basis for the last year+ and still running strong.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleans good, stands up on its own.
customer_reviews.text: We have been getting bagless corded vacuums for many years but this is the first time we got this brand and model. The other ones only last a couple of years before the wheels or something else breaks on them. It will be interesting to see how long this one lasts. This cleans about the same as the other brand, but one thing we like about this one is that it stands up by itself. If you have to set it aside for a minute. The other ones had to be laid down on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: ShoppingGeek

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be better
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum a lot. It picks up dirt great and the bag less dirt cup shows you just how much dust and dirt you have. It's also very easy to dispose of unlike past vacuums I've had that require a bag. My complain is that it's not good for vacuuming under things. If you bend the vacuum back all the way down the wheels come up and you're not picking up anything. It's very good at what it does, I just wish it was able to work laying flat to reach under furniture and beds
customer_reviews.author: Alex Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is simply the best vacuum I have ever owned. I had hardwood floors installed and needed a new vacuum to handle both the hardwood floors and the area rugs well. This Hoover was the perfect solution! It's wonderfully lightweight and picks up everything. It switches easily from bare floor to carpet mode and does a great job on both. I love that it's bagless and emptying the cylinder is a breeze. As others have mentioned, the only change I would make is to increase the cord length, but this a minor thing. I am not really into housework (BORING), but this little guy almost makes vacuuming fun.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Nifty for the price!
customer_reviews.text: . This product really surprised me. Very easy to assemble, good suction, easy to maneuver between rugs and floors. My main issue is beach sand. I have low/no pile area rugs and hardwood floors. it cleans both beautifully. The only drawback is it is a short cord. I am used to having a vacuum that can go from room to room without having to plug and unplug. But No big deal!
customer_reviews.author: pat blanch

product_meta.title: Hoover Linx Bagless Corded Cyclonic Lightweight Stick Vacuum Cleaner, SH20030, Grey
product_meta.description: The Hoover Linx Bagless Corded Cyclonic Lightweight Stick Vacuum Cleaner with WindTunnel Technology removes embedded dirt & minimizes blowback & scatter on carpet. Features a power brush roll, bottom release dirt cup with cyclonic technology, extreme recline handle, edge cleaning bristles and a wide cleaner mouth for larger debris.
feature_bullets: CYCLONIC TECHNOLOGY: Ensures a consistent cleaning Experience with no loss of suction
EXTREME RECLINE HANDLE: Reaches under furniture for easier access without having to move things around
EDGE CLEANING BRISTLES: Removes dirt, dust and pet hair up against those hard to reach edges
Multi FLOOR CLEANING: Transitions from carpet to hard floors with ease
Powerful REACH: 20 foot cord extends room to room

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars4,016 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
